HyperspaceExplorer/src/Functions/ParameterMap.H

00001 #ifndef PARAMETERMAP_H
00002 #define PARAMETERMAP_H
00003 
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 #include <map>
00006 #include <sstream>
00007 
00008 #include "FunctionParameter.H"
00009 #include "Log.H"
00010 
00012 
00016 class ParameterMap : public std::map<std::string, FunctionParameter *> {
00017 public:
00018     ParameterMap(): std::map<std::string, FunctionParameter *> () { }
00019     template<typename T1> ParameterMap(const std::string &_name1,
00020                                        const T1 &_value1):
00021             std::map<std::string, FunctionParameter *> () {
00022         insertByValue(_name1, _value1);
00023     }
00024     ~ParameterMap() { }
00025 
00026     template <typename T> void insertByValue(const std::string _name,
00027                                              const T &_value) {
00028         insert(
00029                 std::make_pair(_name,
00030                     ParameterFactory::Instance().
00031                             createParameterWithValue(_name, _value)));
00032         }
00033     template <typename T> void insertByDefault(const std::string _name,
00034                                                const T &_default) {
00035             insert(
00036                 std::make_pair(_name,
00037                     ParameterFactory::Instance().
00038                             createParameterWithDefault(_name, _default)));
00039         }
00041     std::string print() const {
00042         std::ostringstream o;
00043         o << "[\n";
00044         for (std::map<std::string, FunctionParameter *>::const_iterator i = begin(); i != end(); ++i) {
00045                 o << "    " << i->first << ": \t"
00046                   << i->second->getName() << " = ";
00047                 try {
00048                     o << "(double)" << double(*(i->second)) << std::endl;
00049                 }  catch (FunctionParameterValueBase::WrongParameterTypeException &e) { }
00050                 try {
00051                     o << "(unsigned)" << unsigned(*(i->second)) << std::endl;
00052                 }  catch (FunctionParameterValueBase::WrongParameterTypeException &e) { }
00053                 try {
00054                     o << "(int)" << int(*(i->second)) << std::endl;
00055                 }  catch (FunctionParameterValueBase::WrongParameterTypeException &e) { }
00056                 try {
00057                     o << "(string)" << std::string(*(i->second)) << std::endl;
00058                 }  catch (FunctionParameterValueBase::WrongParameterTypeException &e) { }
00059         }
00060         o << "]" << std::endl << std::ends;
00061 
00062         return o.str();
00063     }
00064 
00065 };
00066 
00067 #endif
